place_of_service.description: Facility type or place of service

patient_responsibility.description: Total patient owes for this line

claim_status.description: Claim status: processed, denied, pending, etc.

settings.system_prompt: Extract all fields from this Explanation of Benefits document. All dollar amounts should be positive numbers. Use null for fields not found.

Extract all fields from this medical bill. All dollar amounts should be positive numbers (e.g. 445.00 not -445.00) â€” adjustments and discounts are inherently reductions, so the sign is implied by the field name. Use null for fields not found.

pointer.description: Diagnosis pointer letter (A, B, C, etc.)

settings.system_prompt: Extract all fields from this CMS-1500 professional claim form. Pay attention to the numbered boxes. All dollar amounts should be positive numbers. Use null for fields not found.

estimated_amount_due.description: FL 55: Estimated amount due from patient

settings.system_prompt: Extract all fields from this UB-04 institutional claim form. Pay attention to form locators (FL). All dollar amounts should be positive numbers. Use null for fields not found.

formulary_tier.description: Formulary tier: generic, preferred brand, etc.

settings.system_prompt: Extract all fields from this pharmacy receipt. All dollar amounts should be positive numbers. Use null for fields not found.

specimen_type.description: Type of specimen: blood, urine, etc.

panel_name.description: Test panel name, e.g. Comprehensive Metabolic Panel

settings.system_prompt: Extract all fields from this laboratory report. All dollar amounts should be positive numbers. Use null for fields not found.
Extract all fields from this ADA Dental Claim form. All dollar amounts should be positive numbers. Use null for fields not found.
Extract all fields from this Prior Authorization letter. All dollar amounts should be positive numbers. Use null for fields not found.
Extract all fields from this Appeal Decision letter. All dollar amounts should be positive numbers. Use null for fields not found.
Extract all fields from this Itemized Statement. All dollar amounts should be positive numbers. Use null for fields not found.

document_type.description: Type of document: EOB, CMS-1500, UB-04, MEDICAL_BILL, PHARMACY_RECEIPT, LAB_REPORT, DENTAL_CLAIM, PRIOR_AUTH, APPEAL_DECISION, ITEMIZED_STATEMENT, or UNKNOWN

summary.description: A 2-3 sentence summary describing the content of the document

rules.description: Explanation of Benefits from an insurance company showing how a claim was processed, including billed amounts, allowed amounts, insurance payments, and patient responsibility.
Professional claim form (CMS-1500/HCFA-1500) used by physicians and suppliers, with numbered boxes for patient, provider, diagnosis codes, and service lines.
Institutional claim form (UB-04/CMS-1450) used by hospitals and facilities, with revenue codes, condition codes, and occurrence codes.
Provider bill or patient statement showing charges, adjustments, payments, and balance due. May include account number and payment options.
Pharmacy prescription receipt showing medication name, NDC code, quantity, days supply, and cost breakdown including copay.
Laboratory test results report showing test names, values, units, reference ranges, and flags for abnormal results.
ADA Dental Claim Form or dental insurance claim showing tooth numbers, surfaces, CDT procedure codes, and dental-specific services.
Prior authorization letter from an insurer showing authorization number, approved or denied services, effective dates, and conditions. May include approval or denial status.
Appeal decision letter regarding a previously denied claim, showing the original denial reason, appeal level, decision (overturned, upheld, partially approved), and next steps.
Detailed itemized hospital or provider statement showing individual charges by department, revenue code, and procedure with granular line-item detail. More detailed than a standard medical bill.
Document that does not match any of the above healthcare document types.
